message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $180 to start.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $180 is my initial asking price, but I could come down to $165 for you.  I think that's very fair given the value you'll get from it.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $165, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $155 for it.
